section.p: You look up into two pairs of eyes that glitter like onyx. There is a rustling sound, a snake-like hiss, and then you dimly hear these words: ‘This one is stricken like the others, my sister...’

A terrible spell prevents you from moving a muscle. There is a sense of days and nights flitting past in less than a heartbeat. You must summon your fading concentration to shrug off the spell before it is too late.
Make a MAGIC roll at a Difficulty of 14 .
